name: Scary Joker It Calling You!
description:
Make a Call with scary joker by using this application and make fun with your friends, scare your friends like a clown joker is calling you.

Features:

• Scary Sounds
• The most professional and beautiful scary joker are calling you here, phone call with phone awesome ringtone.
• Clean and Beautiful design.
• Easy to use

"Welcome to the horror calls from scary joker!! and say hello to the happy joker, lucky joker or scary joker."
Have you ever tried to talk to scary joker?

We Give New Experience, with Beautiful Design

How to Play?

You choice on the who you want call in the happy joker, lucky joker or scary joker, and set his phone ring. Then let your Friends or anyone to Use your device and wait to receive the call.

Thank You for playing with us leave us your feedback and we will try to make our game even better and more interesting!
